lead_paragraph: Nine of the 10 market sectors fell, only utilities managed a slight gain, as investors lost enthusiasm for stocks after two straight weekly gains.

headline.print_headline: Market Erases Most of February’s Gains,  Led by Slumping Health Care Stocks
headline.main: Market Retreats Even as the Price of Oil Rises

snippet: Nine of the 10 market sectors fell, only utilities managed a slight gain, as investors lost enthusiasm for stocks after two straight weekly gains.
abstract: Stocks fall in late-day trading, wiping out almost all February gains.
